item.title: A Nice File Browser for Geany 1.23 on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
item.description: If you’re looking for a file browser for Geany, check out TreeBrowser plugin on its page (see the page for screenshots). To install and enable, just run following o Terminal: sudo apt-get install geany-plugin-treebrowser And go to “Tools” -> “Plugin Manager”, check “TreeBrowser” Source
